actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to disallow trade or business expense deductions for amounts paid to self-insured medical reimbursement plans which discriminate against services performed by chiropractors.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code relating to trade or business expenses to disallow deductions for amounts paid to self-insured medical reimbursement plans which discriminate against services performed by a qualified chiropractor.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to disallow trade or business expense deductions for amounts paid to self-insured medical reimbursement plans which discriminate against services performed by chiropractors.
